name: Flappy Multiverse
description:
Space bar to flap, left and right arrow keys to move.

A new initiative that we've started doing is two day jams to develop new skills at the Studio.

For our first one, two of us spent two days learning Unreal. We wanted to take an existing game and clone it, and give it a bit of a twist. So, thats what we did!

Apparently, when Unreal exports to web it misses out on some visual effects, so that's why it looks a little janky.

Anyway, if you want to play, enjoy!
